S.FORM: == badidiw == 籐編的蓆子 u mitulikay tu badidiw ku kawaw ni ina. siwkay nu badidiw badidiw sa, namasanga' nu wuway. pasaksak i lala' , taneng mueneng taneng mabi. inuayawan, mabi ku tademaw i tatakel. u tatakel sa mahiza tu badidiw, nasangaan nu wuway saca auk. badidw saepi' i lalud mabi'. ayzasa, inayi' ku singing matineng misanga' tu mahiniay. unucakayay amin. tinaku nu kamu misabadidiw misabadidiw 製作藤編的蓆子 / misabadidiw ci Tubah pipawalian tu tipus. pabadidiwan pabadidiwan 放藤編蓆子的地方 / i pabadidiwan pawali ku nilangecan. sibadidiw sibadidiw 有籐編的蓆子 / sibadidiw ku paylumaluma' nu malukay. sibadidiway sibadidiway 有籐編的蓆子的 / nayay tu ku sibadidiway nu malukay ayza. u sulit nu Hulam atu Amilika A mat is a piece of fabric material that generally is placed on a floor or other flat surface. Mats serve a range of purposes including:

== badidiw == 籐編的蓆子 o mitolikay to badidiw ko kawaw ni ina. siwkay no badidiw badidiw sa, namasanga' no woway. pasaksak i lala' , taneng moeneng taneng mabi. inoayawan, mabi ko tademaw i tatakel. o tatakel sa mahiza to badidiw, nasangaan no woway saca aok. badidw saepi' i lalod mabi'. ayzasa, inayi' ko singing matineng misanga' to mahiniay. onocakayay amin. tinako no kamo misabadidiw misabadidiw 製作藤編的蓆子 / misabadidiw ci Tobah pipawalian to tipos. pabadidiwan pabadidiwan 放藤編蓆子的地方 / i pabadidiwan pawali ko nilangecan. sibadidiw sibadidiw 有籐編的蓆子 / sibadidiw ko paylomaloma' no malokay. sibadidiway sibadidiway 有籐編的蓆子的 / nayay to ko sibadidiway no malokay ayza. o solit no Holam ato Amilika A mat is a piece of fabric material that generally is placed on a floor or other flat sorface. Mats serve a range of porposes incloding:
